insert into t_lsgl_rk_czrk (CZRKBH, rybh, sfzh, hh, hklb, yhzgx, hkxz, bdyy, bdqh, bdxz, qryy, qrsj, hdqr, hdqrxz, ryzt, bz, czbs, czdwdm, czdwmc, czsj, czrxm, djdwdm, djdwmc, djrxm, djsj, zrdwdm, zrdwmc, zrmjxm, zrmjjh, zrmjlxdh, zxbs, zxsj, zxyy, zzssxq, zzxz, qtzzssxq, qtzzxz, ssgajgjgdm, ssgajgjgmc, sspcsdm, sspcsmc, rkfwglid, hjsssqbh, djrsfzh, czrsfzh) values (#[czrkbh], #[rybh], #[sfzh], #[hh], #[hklb], #[yhzgx], #[hkxz], #[bdyy], #[bdqh], #[bdxz], #[qryy], to_date(#[qrsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[hdqr], #[hdqrxz], #[ryzt], #[bz], #[czbs], #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czrxm], #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[djrxm], sysdate, #[zrdwdm], #[zrdwmc], #[zrmjxm], #[zrmjjh], #[zrmjlxdh], #[zxbs], to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[zxyy], #[zzssxq], #[zzxz], #[qtzzssxq], #[qtzzxz], #[ssgajgjgdm], #[ssgajgjgmc], #[sspcsdm], #[sspcsmc], #[rkfwglid], #[hjdsssqbh], #[djrsfzh], #[czrsfzh])

update t_lsgl_rk_czrk set czbs = #[czbs], czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], czsj = sysdate, czrxm = #[czrxm], czrsfzh = #[czrsfzh], zrdwdm = #[zrdwdm], zrdwmc = #[zrdwmc], zrmjxm = #[zrmjxm], zrmjjh = #[zrmjjh], zrmjlxdh = #[zrmjlxdh], zzssxq = #[zzssxq], zzxz =#[zzxz], qtzzssxq = #[qtzzssxq], qtzzxz = #[qtzzxz], rkfwglid = #[rkfwglid], hjsssqbh = #[hjdsssqbh] where czrkbh = #[czrkbh]

insert into t_lsgl_rkfw_gl (rybh, fwid, dzid, rkfwglid,zxbs,zxsj,zxmjxm,zxdwdm,zxdwmc,sfzh,rzsj,djsj) values (#[rybh], #[fwid], (select dzid from t_lsgl_fw_jbxx where fwid=#[fwid] and rownum=1), #[rkfwglid],'0',to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#[zxmjxm],#[zxdwdm],#[zxdwmc], #[sfzh],to_date(#[rzsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'),sysdate)

update t_lsgl_rkfw_gl set rybh=#[rybh], fwid = #[fwid], dzid = #[dzid], zxbs = #[zxbs], zxsj = to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), zxmjxm = #[zxmjxm], zxdwdm = #[zxdwdm], zxdwmc = #[zxdwmc] where rkfwglid = #[rkfwglid]
select fw.* from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl inner join t_lsgl_fw_jbxx fw on gl.fwid=fw.fwid where gl.rybh=?

select gl.rybh,gl.fwid,gl.dzid,fw.fwmc,gl.rkfwglid,f_get_dzmc(gl.dzid) as dzmc from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl inner join t_lsgl_fw_jbxx fw on gl.fwid=fw.fwid inner join t_common_dzxx dz on dz.dzid=gl.dzid where gl.rkfwglid=?

update t_lsgl_rk_wlhczhk set czjzl = #[czjzl], czjhm = #[czjhm], wlhyy = #[wlhyy], wlhqssj = to_date(#[wlhqssj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), yhjdqh = #[yhjdqh], yhjdxz = #[yhjdxz], csdxz = #[csdxz], bz = #[bz], czbs = #[czbs], czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], czsj = sysdate, czrxm = #[czrxm], czrsfzh = #[czrsfzh], zrdwdm = #[zrdwdm], zrdwmc = #[zrdwmc], zrmjxm = #[zrmjxm], zrmjjh = #[zrmjjh], zrmjlxdh = #[zrmjlxdh], zxbs = #[zxbs], zxsj = to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), zxyy = #[zxyy], rkfwglid = #[rkfwglid], ssgajgjgdm = #[ssgajgjgdm], ssgajgjgmc = #[ssgajgjgmc], sspcsdm = #[sspcsdm], sspcsmc = #[sspcsmc], sssqbh = #[sssqbh] where wlhrkbh = #[wlhrkbh]

insert into t_lsgl_rk_jwrkxx (jwbh, rybh, rjzjzl, rjzjhm, zjyxq, qzzl, qzyxq, tlyxq, qzjg, tlsy, qfrq, rzsj, czbs, czdwdm, czdwmc, czsj, czrxm, djdwdm, djdwmc, djrxm, djsj, zrdwdm, zrdwmc, zrmjxm, zrmjjh, zrmjlxdh, jwrylx, zxbs, zxsj, zxyy, bz,rkfwglid,sssqbh,ywx,ywm,djrsfzh,czrsfzh) values (#[jwbh], #[rybh], #[rjzjzl], #[rjzjhm], to_date(#[zjyxq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[qzzl], to_date(#[qzyxq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#[tlyxq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[qzjg], #[tlsy], to_date(#[qfrq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#[rzsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[czbs], #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czrxm], #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[djrxm], sysdate, #[zrdwdm], #[zrdwmc], #[zrmjxm], #[zrmjjh], #[zrmjlxdh], #[jwrylx], #[zxbs], to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[zxyy], #[bz],#[rkfwglid],#[sssqbh],#[ywx],#[ywm],#[djrsfzh],#[czrsfzh])

update t_lsgl_rk_jwrkxx set rjzjzl = #[rjzjzl], rjzjhm = #[rjzjhm], zjyxq = to_date(#[zjyxq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), qzzl = #[qzzl], qzyxq = to_date(#[qzyxq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), tlyxq = to_date(#[tlyxq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), qzjg = #[qzjg], tlsy = #[tlsy], qfrq = to_date(#[qfrq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), rzsj = to_date(#[rzsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), czbs = #[czbs], czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], czsj = sysdate, czrxm = #[czrxm], czrsfzh = #[czrsfzh], zrdwdm = #[zrdwdm], zrdwmc = #[zrdwmc], zrmjxm = #[zrmjxm], zrmjjh = #[zrmjjh], zrmjlxdh = #[zrmjlxdh], jwrylx = #[jwrylx], zxbs = #[zxbs], zxsj = to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), zxyy = #[zxyy], bz = #[bz], rkfwglid = #[rkfwglid], sssqbh = #[sssqbh], ywx = #[ywx], ywm= #[ywm], djrsfzh = #[djrsfzh], djdwdm = #[djdwdm], djdwmc = #[djdwmc], djrxm = #[djrxm], djsj = to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where jwbh = #[jwbh]
update t_lsgl_rkfw_gl set zxbs = #[zxbs], zxsj = sysdate, zxmjxm = #[zxmjxm], zxdwdm = #[zxdwdm], zxdwmc = #[zxdwmc], zxyy = '' where rybh = #[rybh] and zxbs='1'

select gl.rkfwglid, gl.rybh, gl.fwid, fw.fwmc, gl.dzid, f_get_dzmc(gl.dzid) as dzmc, gl.rzsj, gl.blsj, gl.zxbs, gl.zxsj, gl.zxmjxm, gl.zxdwdm, gl.zxdwmc, gl.zxyy, gl.djsj from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl INNER join t_lsgl_fw_jbxx fw on gl.fwid=fw.fwid inner join t_common_dzxx dz on dz.dzid=fw.dzid where gl.rybh=? and gl.zxbs <> '1' order by gl.djsj desc
update t_lsgl_rkfw_gl set ZXBS='1', ZXSJ=sysdate, zxyy= #[zxyy], zxmjxm = #[zxmjxm], zxdwdm = #[zxdwdm], zxdwmc = #[zxdwmc] where RKFWGLID=#[rkfwglid]

select * from v_lsgl_rk_czrk where (zxbs <> '1' or zxbs is null) and rybh=?
update t_lsgl_rk_jbxx set rysx=? where sfzh=?
select ld.*,ld.czrkbh as rkid from t_lsgl_rk_czrk ld where ld.sfzh=? and ld.rkfwglid in (select gl.rkfwglid from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl where fwid=?)

select lk.zzbh as rkid, lk.ZZBH, lk.ZZZBH, lk.HH, lk.FZSFZH, lk.FZXM, lk.YHZGX, TO_CHAR(lk.LBDRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LBDRQ, TO_CHAR(lk.ZZZQFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ZZZQFRQ, TO_CHAR(lk.ZZZYXQJZRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ZZZYXQJZRQ, lk.XFWCS, lk.ZZSY, lk.ZZDQH, lk.ZZDXZ, lk.CZBS, lk.CZDWDM, lk.CZDWMC, lk.CZSJ, lk.CZRXM, lk.DJDWDM, lk.DJDWMC, lk.DJRXM, lk.DJSJ, lk.ZRDWDM, lk.ZRDWMC, lk.ZRMJXM, lk.ZRMJJH, lk.ZRMJLXDH, lk.XCSZY, lk.SSGAJGJGDM, lk.SSGAJGJGMC, lk.SSPCSDM, lk.SSPCSMC, lk.ZZCS, lk.ZXBS, lk.ZXSJ, lk.ZXYY, lk.ZAGLZRRXM, lk.ZAGLZRRSFZH, lk.GZGX, lk.FHBH, lk.BZ, lk.HDQK, lk.HJDLX, lk.NJZQX, lk.bmzw, lk.sfzhbx, lk.sfjkzm, lk.sfjhsy, TO_CHAR(lk.NJZRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NJZRQ, lk.RKFWGLID , lk.qx from t_lsgl_rk_ldrkzzxx lk where (lk.zxbs='0' or lk.zxbs is null) and lk.sfzh=? and exists ( select 1 from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl where lk.rkfwglid=gl.rkfwglid and gl.fwid=? ) order by lk.djsj desc

select C.WLHRKBH, c.rybh, c.sfzh, C.CZJZL, C.CZJHM, C.WLHYY, TO_CHAR(C.WLHQSSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WLHQSSJ, C.YHJDQH, C.YHJDXZ, C.CSDXZ, C.BZ, C.CZBS, C.CZDWDM, C.CZDWMC, C.CZSJ, C.CZRXM, C.DJDWDM, C.DJDWMC, C.DJRXM, C.DJSJ, C.ZRDWDM, C.ZRDWMC, C.ZRMJXM, C.ZRMJJH, C.ZRMJLXDH, C.ZXBS, C.ZXSJ, C.ZXYY, C.Rkfwglid, C.SSGAJGJGDM, C.SSGAJGJGMC, C.SSPCSDM, C.SSPCSMC, c.sssqbh from t_lsgl_rk_wlhczhk c where (c.zxbs='0' or c.zxbs is null) and c.sfzh=? and exists ( select 1 from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl where c.rkfwglid=gl.rkfwglid and gl.fwid=? ) order by c.djsj desc

select C.JZBH, TO_CHAR(C.JZSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JZSJ, C.JZYY, C.YHZGY, C.HZSFZH, C.HZXM, C.GLLB, C.CZBS, C.CZDWDM, C.CZDWMC, TO_CHAR(C.CZSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CZSJ, C.CZRXM, C.DJDWDM, C.DJDWMC, C.DJRXM, C.DJSJ, C.ZRDWDM, C.ZRDWMC, C.ZRMJXM, C.ZRMJJH, C.ZRMJLXDH, C.ZXBS, C.RKFWGLID, C.sssqbh, TO_CHAR(C.ZXSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZXSJ, C.ZXYY, C.BZ, c.jzbh as rkid from t_lsgl_rk_jzrkxx c where c.sfzh=? and (c.zxbs='0' or c.zxbs is null) and exists (select 1 from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl where gl.rkfwglid=c.rkfwglid and gl.fwid=?)
update t_lsgl_rkfw_gl set fwid = #[fwid], dzid = #[dzid] where rkfwglid = #[rkfwglid]

update t_lsgl_rk_jbxx set rysx=? where sfzh=?

select * from (select rkfwglid, rybh, fwid, dzid, to_char(rzsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as rzsj, to_char(blsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as blsj, zxbs, to_char(zxsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as zxsj, zxmjxm, zxdwdm, zxdwmc, zxyy, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as djsj, sfzh from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl where sfzh = ? order by djsj desc) where rownum = '1'

select rkfwglid, rybh, fwid, dzid, to_char(rzsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as rzsj, to_char(blsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as blsj, zxbs, to_char(zxsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as zxsj, zxmjxm, zxdwdm, zxdwmc, zxyy, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as djsj, sfzh from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl where rybh = ? and (zxbs = '0' or zxbs is null)

delete t_lsgl_rk_jwrkxx where jwbh = ?

delete t_lsgl_rk_ldrkzzxx where zzbh =?

select xm, sfzh, xb, xzzxz, rylb, mz, hjdxz, id, jlbh, jhsyyq, jszhm, fzrq, znqk, byjycs, djrxm, djrjh, djdwdm, djdwmc, djsj, jbxx.rybh from t_lsgl_rk_jhsy jhsy left join t_lsgl_rk_jbxx jbxx on jhsy.rybh = jbxx.rybh where 1 = 1 #if ($xb && !$xb.equals("")) and jbxx.xb=#[xb] #end #if ($csrq_start && !$csrq_start.equals("")) and jbxx.csrq >= to_date(#[csrq_start],'yyyy-MM-dd') #end #if($csrq_end && !$csrq_end.equals("")) and jbxx.csrq <= to_date(#[csrq_end],'yyyy-MM-dd') #end
#if ($fzrq_start && !$fzrq_start.equals("")) and jhsy.fzrq >= to_date(#[fzrq_start],'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($csrq_end && !$csrq_end.equals("")) and jhsy.fzrq <= to_date(#[fzrq_end],'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end
#if ($djsj_start && !$djsj_start.equals("")) and jhsy.djsj >= to_date(#[djsj_start],'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($djsj_end && !$djsj_end.equals("")) and jhsy.djsj <= to_date(#[djsj_end],'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($leve==5) and djdwdm = #[orgcode] #else #if ($pcsdm && !$pcsdm.equals("")) and djdwdm like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%' #elseif($countrygajgjgdm && !$countrygajgjgdm.equals("")) and djdwdm like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%' #elseif($citygajgjgdm && !$citygajgjgdm.equals("")) and djdwdm like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%' #end #end

update t_lsgl_rk_jhsy set id = #[id], jlbh = #[jlbh], jhsyyq = #[jhsyyq], jszhm = #[jszhm], fzrq = to_date(#[fzrq],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), znqk = #[znqk], byjycs = #[byjycs], rybh = #[rybh] where id = #[id]

select /*+rule*/ ck.czrkbh, rk.rybh, rk.sfzh, rk.XZZQH, rk.XZZXZ, ck.HJSSSQBH, rk.HJDQH, rk.HJDXZ, '1' as rylb, rk.xm as xm, rk.lxdh as lxdh, rk.xb as xb, ck.zxbs as zxbs, ck.czdwdm, ck.djdwdm, ck.zrdwdm, to_char(rk.csrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') as csrq, ck.hh, ck.hklb, to_char(ck.qrsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as qrsj, ck.qtzzssxq, ck.qtzzxz, to_char(ck.czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as czsj, ck.hh, ck.yhzgx from T_lsgl_rk_czrk ck,t_lsgl_rk_jbxx rk where 1=1 and ck.rybh=rk.rybh
#if($hjdqh && !$hjdqh.equals("")) and rk.hjdqh like substr(#[hjdqh],0,4)||'%' #end #if ($zjzl && !$zjzl.equals("111")) and rk.zjzl=#[zjzl] #end
#if($zjhm && !$zjhm.equals("") && $zjzl.equals("111")) and ck.sfzh=trim(#[zjhm]) #end #if ($xb && !$xb.equals("")) and rk.xb=#[xb] #end #if ($csrq_start && !$csrq_start.equals("")) and rk.csrq >= to_date(#[csrq_start],'yyyy-MM-dd') #end #if($csrq_end && !$csrq_end.equals("")) and rk.csrq <= to_date(#[csrq_end],'yyyy-MM-dd') #end #if($xm && !$xm.equals("")) and (rk.xm like trim(#[xm])||'%' or Lower(rk.xmpy) like Lower(trim(#[xm]))||'%') #end #if($zxbs && !$zxbs.equals("") && $zxbs.equals("0")) and (zxbs = #[zxbs] or zxbs is null) #end #if($zxbs && !$zxbs.equals("") && $zxbs.equals("1")) and (zxbs = #[zxbs]) #end #if ($djsj_start && !$djsj_start.equals("")) and ck.djsj >= to_date(#[djsj_start]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($djsj_end && !$djsj_end.equals("")) and ck.djsj <= to_date(#[djsj_end]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end
#if($sqdm && !$sqdm.equals("")) and ck.hjsssqbh = #[sqdm] #elseif($jwsqdm && !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and (ck.zrdwdm = #[jwsqdm]) #elseif ($pcsdm && !$pcsdm.equals("")) and ck.zrdwdm like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%' #elseif($countrygajgjgdm && !$countrygajgjgdm.equals("")) and ck.hjdqh=substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6) #elseif($citygajgjgdm && !$citygajgjgdm.equals("")) and ck.hjdqh like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%' #end order by ck.hh

select /*+rule*/ ck.czrkbh, rk.rybh, ck.sfzh, rk.XZZQH, rk.XZZXZ, ck.HJSSSQBH, rk.HJDQH, rk.HJDXZ, '1' as rylb, rk.xm as xm, rk.lxdh as lxdh, rk.xb as xb, ck.zxbs as zxbs, ck.czdwdm, ck.djdwdm, ck.zrdwdm, to_char(rk.csrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') as csrq, ck.hh, ck.hklb, to_char(ck.qrsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as qrsj, ck.qtzzssxq, ck.qtzzxz, to_char(ck.czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as czsj, ck.hh, ck.yhzgx from T_lsgl_rk_czrk ck,t_lsgl_rk_jbxx rk where rk.rybh=ck.rybh and ck.CZRKBH in (#[czrkbhs]) order by ck.hh

select * from v_lsgl_rk_jzrkxx where 1=1 #if($hjdqh && !$hjdqh.equals("")) and hjdqh like substr(#[hjdqh],0,4)||'%' #end
#if ($zjzl && !$zjzl.equals("111")) and zjzl=#[zjzl] #end
#if($zjhm && !$zjhm.equals("") && $zjzl.equals("111")) and sfzh=trim(#[zjhm]) #end
#if ($xb && !$xb.equals("")) and xb=#[xb] #end #if ($csrq_start && !$csrq_start.equals("")) and csrq >= #[csrq_start] #end #if ($csrq_end && !$csrq_end.equals("")) and csrq <= #[csrq_end] #end

#if($zxbs && !$zxbs.equals("") && $zxbs.equals("0")) and (zxbs = #[zxbs] or zxbs is null) #end #if($zxbs && !$zxbs.equals("") && $zxbs.equals("1")) and (zxbs = #[zxbs]) #end #if ($djsj_start && !$djsj_start.equals("")) and djsj >= to_date(#[djsj_start]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($djsj_end && !$djsj_end.equals("")) and djsj <= to_date(#[djsj_end]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end
#if($sqdm && !$sqdm.equals("")) and sssqbh = #[sqdm] #elseif($jwsqdm && !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and (zrdwdm = #[jwsqdm] or czdwdm =#[jwsqdm] or djdwdm = #[jwsqdm]) #elseif ($pcsdm && !$pcsdm.equals("")) and ( djdwdm like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%' or czdwdm like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%' or zrdwdm like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%' ) #elseif($countrygajgjgdm && !$countrygajgjgdm.equals("")) and ( djdwdm like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%' or czdwdm like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%' or zrdwdm like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%' ) #elseif($citygajgjgdm && !$citygajgjgdm.equals("")) and ( djdwdm like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%' or czdwdm like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%' or zrdwdm like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%' ) #end

select syrk.rylb rylb, syrk.zxbs zxbs, syrk.rkid rkid, syrk.zxsj zxsj, syrk.djsj djsj, syrk.djdwdm djdwdm, syrk.djdwmc djdwmc, jbxx.rybh rybh, jbxx.sfzh sfzh, jbxx.lxdh lxdh, jbxx.xm xm, jbxx.xb xb, gl.dzid dzid, gl.fwid fwid, gl.rkfwglid rkfwglid, (select HZSFZH from t_lsgl_fw_jbxx where fwid=gl.fwid) as fzsfzh, (select HZXM from t_lsgl_fw_jbxx where fwid=gl.fwid) as fzxm, f_get_dzmc(gl.dzid) as dzmc from v_lsgl_rk_syrk syrk, t_lsgl_rk_jbxx jbxx, t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl where jbxx.rybh = syrk.rybh and syrk.rkfwglid = gl.rkfwglid and jbxx.rybh = ? order by syrk.djsj desc

select syrk.rylb rylb, syrk.zxbs zxbs, syrk.rkid rkid, syrk.djsj djsj, syrk.zxsj zxsj, syrk.djdwdm djdwdm, syrk.djdwmc djdwmc, jbxx.rybh rybh, jbxx.sfzh sfzh, jbxx.lxdh lxdh, jbxx.xm xm, jbxx.xb xb, gl.dzid dzid, gl.fwid fwid, gl.rkfwglid rkfwglid, f_get_dzmc(gl.dzid) as dzmc from v_lsgl_rk_syrk syrk, t_lsgl_rk_jbxx jbxx, t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl where jbxx.rybh = syrk.rybh and syrk.rkfwglid = gl.rkfwglid and jbxx.rybh = (select rybh from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx where sfzh = ?) order by syrk.djsj desc

union all
select rk.rybh,rk.sfzh,rk.xm,rk.zjzl,rk.zjhm,rk.xmpy,rk.xb,rk.csrq,rk.hjdqh,rk.hjdxz,rk.xzzxz,rk.LXDH, jz.zrdwdm,jz.zrdwmc,jz.djsj,jz.jzbh as rkid,rk.mz,jz.sssqbh,jz.zxbs as zxbs from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx rk inner join t_lsgl_rk_jzrkxx jz on rk.rybh=jz.rybh where 1=1 #if($sqdm && !$sqdm.equals("")) and jz.sssqbh = #[sqdm] #elseif ($jwsqdm && !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and jz.zrdwdm = #[jwsqdm] #elseif ($pcsdm && !$pcsdm.equals("")) and jz.zrdwdm like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%' #elseif($countrygajgjgdm && !$countrygajgjgdm.equals("")) and (jz.zrdwdm like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%') #elseif($citygajgjgdm && !$citygajgjgdm.equals("")) and (jz.zrdwdm like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%') #end
union all
select rk.rybh,rk.sfzh,rk.xm,rk.zjzl,rk.zjhm,rk.xmpy,rk.xb,rk.csrq,rk.hjdqh,rk.hjdxz,rk.xzzxz,rk.LXDH, w.zrdwdm,w.zrdwmc,w.djsj,w.wlhrkbh as rkid,rk.mz,w.sssqbh,w.zxbs as zxbs from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx rk inner join t_lsgl_rk_wlhczhk w on rk.rybh=w.rybh where 1=1 #if($sqdm && !$sqdm.equals("")) and w.sssqbh = #[sqdm] #elseif ($jwsqdm && !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and w.zrdwdm = #[jwsqdm] #elseif ($pcsdm && !$pcsdm.equals("")) and w.zrdwdm like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%' #elseif($countrygajgjgdm && !$countrygajgjgdm.equals("")) and (w.zrdwdm like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%') #elseif($citygajgjgdm && !$citygajgjgdm.equals("")) and (w.zrdwdm like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%') #end ) t where 1=1 #if ($xm && !$xm.equals("")) and ( t.xm like #[xm]||'%' )
#end
#if ($zjzl && !$zjzl.equals("111")) and t.zjzl=#[zjzl] #end
#if($zjhm && !$zjhm.equals("")) #if($zjzl && $zjzl.equals("111")) and t.sfzh = #[zjhm] #else and t.zjhm = #[zjhm] #end #end
#if($xb && !$xb.equals("")) and t.xb = #[xb] #end #if($mz && !$mz.equals("")) and t.mz = #[mz] #end
#if($csrq_start && !$csrq_start.equals("")) #if($csrq_end.equals("")) and t.csrq = to_date(#[csrq_start],'yyyy-MM-dd') #else and t.csrq >= to_date(#[csrq_start],'yyyy-MM-dd') #end #end
#if($csrq_end && !$csrq_end.equals("")) #if($csrq_start.equals("")) and t.csrq = to_date(#[csrq_end],'yyyy-MM-dd') #else and t.csrq <= to_date(#[csrq_end],'yyyy-MM-dd') #end #end
#if($hjdqh && !$hjdqh.equals("")) and t.hjdqh like substr(#[hjdqh],0,4)||'%' #end
#if ($czsj_start && !$czsj_start.equals("")) and t.djsj >= to_date(#[djsj_start]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($czsj_end && !$czsj_end.equals("")) and t.djsj <= to_date(#[djsj_end]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end
#if($zxbs && !$zxbs.equals("") && $zxbs.equals("0")) and (zxbs = #[zxbs] or zxbs is null) #end #if($zxbs && !$zxbs.equals("") && $zxbs.equals("1")) and (zxbs = #[zxbs]) #end

select * from ( select rk.rybh,rk.sfzh,rk.xm,rk.zjzl,rk.zjhm,rk.xmpy,rk.xb,to_char(rk.csrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') csrq,rk.hjdqh,rk.hjdxz,rk.xzzxz,rk.LXDH, c.zrdwdm,c.zrdwmc,c.djsj,c.czrkbh as rkid from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx rk inner join t_lsgl_rk_czrk c on rk.rybh=c.rybh
union all
select rk.rybh,rk.sfzh,rk.xm,rk.zjzl,rk.zjhm,rk.xmpy,rk.xb,to_char(rk.csrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') csrq,rk.hjdqh,rk.hjdxz,rk.xzzxz,rk.LXDH, l.zrdwdm,l.zrdwmc,l.djsj,l.zzbh as rkid from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx rk inner join t_lsgl_rk_ldrkzzxx l on rk.rybh=l.rybh
union all
select rk.rybh,rk.sfzh,rk.xm,rk.zjzl,rk.zjhm,rk.xmpy,rk.xb,to_char(rk.csrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') csrq,rk.hjdqh,rk.hjdxz,rk.xzzxz,rk.LXDH, jz.zrdwdm,jz.zrdwmc,jz.djsj,jz.jzbh as rkid from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx rk inner join t_lsgl_rk_jzrkxx jz on rk.rybh=jz.rybh
union all
select rk.rybh,rk.sfzh,rk.xm,rk.zjzl,rk.zjhm,rk.xmpy,rk.xb,to_char(rk.csrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') csrq,rk.hjdqh,rk.hjdxz,rk.xzzxz,rk.LXDH, w.zrdwdm,w.zrdwmc,w.djsj,w.wlhrkbh as rkid from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx rk inner join t_lsgl_rk_wlhczhk w on rk.rybh=w.rybh
) t where 1=1 and rkid in (#[rkids])

select rybh, xm, sfzh, xb, gj, mz, to_char(csrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') csrq, bmch, byzk, ywm, whcd, zjzl, zjhm, zzmm, hyzk, sg, xx, zzxy, zc, lxdh, fwcs, zydm, zw, sf, (select mc from t_common_dictionary t where t.zdlb = 'GB_XZQH' and t.zdmc = '' and dm = jg ) as jg, rysx, f_get_rylb(sfzh,(select max(fw.fwid) from t_lsgl_fw_jbxx fw where fw.dzid = f_getdzid_by_rybh(rybh))) as rylb, hjdqh, hjdxz, ssgajgjgdm, ssgajgjgmc, sspcsdm, sspcsmc, swrq, swzmbh, zwbh, dnabh, xxjb, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, czrjh, czrxm, czbs, xzzqh, xzzqhmc, f_get_dzmc(f_getdzid_by_rybh(rybh)) as xzzxz, xzzzrq, rytssx, lxdhbz, fromstdate, xmpy, csd, sfjwtdj from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx where 1=1 and rybh in (#[rybhs])

select ck.CZRKBH, ck.HH, ck.HKLB, ck.YHZGX, ck.HKXZ, ck.BDYY, TO_CHAR(ck.BDSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BDSJ, ck.BDQH, ck.BDXZ, ck.QRYY, TO_CHAR(ck.QRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QRSJ, ck.HDQR, ck.HDQRXZ, ck.RYZT, ck.BZ, ck.CZBS, ck.CZDWDM, ck.CZDWMC, ck.CZSJ, ck.CZRXM, ck.DJDWDM, ck.DJDWMC, ck.DJRXM, ck.DJSJ, ck.ZRDWDM, ck.ZRDWMC, ck.ZRMJXM, ck.ZRMJJH, ck.ZRMJLXDH, ck.ZXBS, ck.ZXSJ, ck.ZXYY, ck.ZZSSXQ, ck.ZZXZ, ck.QTZZSSXQ, ck.QTZZXZ, ck.JHRYXM, ck.YJHRYGX, ck.JHREXM, ck.YJHREGX, ck.RKFWGLID from t_lsgl_rk_czrk ck inner join t_lsgl_rkfw_gl gl on ck.rkfwglid=gl.rkfwglid where gl.fwid=? and ck.sfzh=? and (ck.ZXBS='0' or ck.zxbs is null) order by gl.djsj desc
select fwid from t_lsgl_rkfw_gl where rkfwglid=?

select dzmc from ( select f_get_dzmc_byrkfwglid(c.rkfwglid) as dzmc from t_lsgl_rk_czrk c where sfzh=#[sfzh] and djdwdm=#[orgcode] and (zxbs is null or zxbs='0')
union all
select f_get_dzmc_byrkfwglid(l.rkfwglid) as dzmc from t_lsgl_rk_ldrkzzxx l where sfzh=#[sfzh] and djdwdm=#[orgcode] and (zxbs is null or zxbs='0')
union all
select f_get_dzmc_byrkfwglid(j.rkfwglid) as dzmc from t_lsgl_rk_jzrkxx j where sfzh=#[sfzh] and djdwdm=#[orgcode] and (zxbs is null or zxbs='0')
union all
select f_get_dzmc_byrkfwglid(w.rkfwglid) as dzmc from t_lsgl_rk_wlhczhk w where sfzh=#[sfzh] and djdwdm=#[orgcode] and (zxbs is null or zxbs='0') ) where rownum=1

select rybh from ( select rybh from t_lsgl_rk_czrk c where sfzh=#[sfzh] and djdwdm=#[orgcode] and (zxbs is null or zxbs='0')
union all
select rybh from t_lsgl_rk_ldrkzzxx l where sfzh=#[sfzh] and djdwdm=#[orgcode] and (zxbs is null or zxbs='0')
union all
select rybh from t_lsgl_rk_jzrkxx j where sfzh=#[sfzh] and djdwdm=#[orgcode] and (zxbs is null or zxbs='0')
union all
select rybh from t_lsgl_rk_wlhczhk w where sfzh=#[sfzh] and djdwdm=#[orgcode] and (zxbs is null or zxbs='0') ) where rownum=1
select rybh from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx where sfzh=?

select rybh,sfzh,ydsrgx, (select xm from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx where sfzh=g.sfzh) as gxrxm, (select lxdh from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx where sfzh=g.sfzh) as gxrlxdh, (select xzzxz from t_lsgl_rk_jbxx where sfzh=g.sfzh) as gxrxzdxz from t_lsgl_rk_gxr g where gxrsfzh=?
